name: Bouncy Boy (FromZeroDev)
description:
Bouncy Boy is a game about a bouncy little light whose dream is to reach the stars.

Use 'A' and 'D' to move left and right, and use 'S' to bounce!

Can you bounce your way to the top?

This game was made in Unity 2019.  Total development time was about 15 hours over the course of 1 week.

If you have any comments or feedback, or encounter and bugs, feel free to let me know!
